body.p: Which of the following describes the orientation of both thick and thin filaments in the sarcomere?

multiple_choice.choice: thin and thick filaments are found in different parts of the sarcomere

feedback.p: Correct. The filaments all go in the same direction with some overlap.
Incorrect. This would mean the filaments are oriented at right angles to one another, which is not the case.
Incorrect. If the filaments were skewed, they could not interact properly.
Incorrect. The filaments are found in the same parts of the sarcomere.
